snippet: Kim Jong-un’s trip to Panmunjon, a compound straddling the border, was the first time he put himself in full view — and within the range — of South Korean border guards.
lead_paragraph: Kim Jong-un’s trip to Panmunjon, a compound straddling the border, was the first time he put himself in full view — and within the range — of South Korean border guards.

headline.seo: North Korean Leader, Kim Jong-un, Visits Troops on the Border
headline.main: North Korean Leader Takes a Defiant Stance as He Visits Border
headline.print_headline: North Korean Leader Takes a Defiant Stance as He Visits Border
